title: A Research brief
creator_credit: AKO, National Research Council of Canada and ONF | NFB
brief_description: This film covers the following National Research Council projects at fort-aux-Basques harbour, Newfoundland - simulated icing of helicopters, the comet kohoutek, seaweeds, seals, an updated windmill, automation on the farm, and a revolutionary highway safety installation. Photographers, Grant Crabtree, John McAulay, Ken Orton.
